intro: Castanopsis javanica, commonly known as the Java chestnut. It is a deciduous evergreen tree native to Southeast Asia, particularly Indonesia. The plant belongs to the Fagaceae family, which includes oaks and beeches. Its leaves are alternate, simple, and革质 (leathery), with a glossy surface. The tree produces small, cup-shaped fruit with a hard, spiky shell enclosing one or two seeds.
